How It Works: 4 Simple Steps

No complex setup. No ongoing commitments. Just a clear snapshot of where you stand in AI search.

1. You Choose Your Market

Tell us your business type and location. We'll suggest the key phrases customers use to find you, or customize your own list.

2. We Test Live AI Responses

Our system asks ChatGPT (and other AIs) your exact phrases and captures who gets recommended. Real searches, real results, real citations. No simulations. We test what your customers actually see.

3. We Map Your Competition

We identify patterns in the results and trace back the sources driving recommendations. Which review sites matter? What content influences AI? And discover the hidden factors that determine AI rankings.

4. You Get Your Scorecard

Your visibility score, competitor analysis, and the exact sources you need to target. Stop guessing, start winning. See exactly where you stand and how to improve.

Best For: Local Businesses

We designed this audit for any business that relies on local discovery to find new customers and clients. If you compete in a specific city or region, you need to know what AI is saying about you.

Real Estate Professionals

Perfect for brokerages, teams, listing/buyer agents, and boutique firms looking to be seen as the market leaders.

Local Service Companies

For roofers, HVAC techs, plumbers, solar installers, pest control experts, cleaners, landscapers, and other home service professionals.

Professional Firms

Ideal for law firms, accountants, dentists, med-aesthetic clinics, and other local specialists who need to maintain a trusted reputation.
